article_title: French Economic Recovery Not Yet Here, 75% Managers Say in Poll
article_text: SHARE THIS ARTICLE   Share   Tweet   Post   Email  {"contentId":"NP8E7ASYF01S01","position":"brokerboxarticle","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[120,60]],"small_desktop":[[120,60]],"tablet":[[120,60]]},"strategy":"viewable","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"brokerboxarticle1","url":"/news/articles/2015-06-01/french-economic-recovery-not-yet-here-75-managers-say-in-poll"},"containerId":"brokerboxarticle-roamcmk"}   Poll by Vivavoice for HEC business school, Le Figaro newspaper and France Inter radio station surveyed 400 people May 13-19.  Managers saying recovery hasn’t come yet remain pessimistic about France: 63% anticipate drop in employment, 39% expect drop in quality of life Results however show improvement over last several months Cos. where managers most eager to be working in future include EDF at 17%, Total at 15% and SNCF at 9%, poll shows.      Published on ‎1‎ ‎June‎, ‎2015‎ ‎06‎:‎00        Have a confidential tip for our reporters? GET IN TOUCH    Before it's here, it's on the Bloomberg Terminal.
